food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am a fruit.
🐒 I grow on trees and monkeys like to peel me.
🛥️ Think of something long and curvy.

food.question: I am red and round, and I grow on a tree. Sometimes I am used to make juice. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am a fruit that is a popular color.
🌳 Snow White liked to eat me.
🥤 People drink me as juice.

food.question: I am long and orange and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a vegetable.
🐰 Bugs Bunny likes me.
👁️ People say I am good for your eyes.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me with cookies. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am a liquid.
🐄 I am needed to make ice cream.
🍪 I go well with cookies.

food.question: I am small and green and grow in a pod. You can eat me as a side dish. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am a vegetable.
🌱 I grow in a pod.
🥣 I am sometimes in soup.

food.question: I am made from flour and baked in the oven. You can put jam on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am a type of bread.
🔥 I am often toasted for breakfast.
🥪 You can make a sandwich with me.

food.question: I am a sweet treat that is cold and creamy. I come in many flavors! What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am a dessert.
🥶 I melt if you don't eat me fast enough.
🌈 I can be vanilla, chocolate, or strawberry.

food.question: I am round and covered in seeds. I am often red on the inside and eaten in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am a fruit.
⛱️ I am a popular fruit in the summer.
🌱 I have black seeds.

food.question: I am made of dough, covered in sauce and cheese, and baked in an oven. You can add lots of different toppings on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 I am a popular food to eat at parties.
🍅 My base is made of tomato sauce.
🍄 You can add vegetables, meats, and cheeses to me.

food.question: I am a yellow spread that is made from milk. You put me on bread or crackers. What am I?

hints.text: 🧈 I am a dairy product.
🐄 I am made from churning cream.
🥪 I make a good sandwich with peanut butter.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright and come out at night. I shine in the darkness. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I change my shape; sometimes I'm round, sometimes a sliver.
🐺 Animals howl at me!
🌌 I orbit the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am very hot and give light and warmth to the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunglasses to look at me!
🌻 Plants need me to grow.
🔥 I am a big ball of fire!

cosmos.question: I'm a bright light far away, twinkling in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 Many of me make up constellations.
✨ I'm much bigger than I look.
🌌 I twinkle because I'm very far away.

cosmos.question: I'm a big ball that floats in space. Earth is one of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 People live on me.
🏀 I am round like a ball.
🪐 I go around the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am red and dusty, and sometimes people call me the Red Planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People are trying to visit me!
🍫 I am the color of rust or chocolate.
🪐 I am a planet in our solar system.

cosmos.question: I am the biggest planet in our solar system and have a big red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 My red spot is a giant storm!
🪐 I am made of gas.
🖐️ I am so big that many Earths could fit inside me!

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 One of me looks like a bear.
🌌 Some are named after animals or people from stories.
✨ People use me to find their way.

cosmos.question: I am a very, very big group of stars, dust, and gas held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 Our Sun is part of me!
🌌 I have many stars in me, more than you can count!
🥛 One that you may have heard of is called the Milky Way.

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings around me that are made of ice and rock. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very wide but also very thin.
🪐 I am a planet far away from the Sun.
🧊 My rings sparkle in the sunlight.

cosmos.question: I am a giant explosion in space that makes a very bright light. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I am the death of a big star.
✨ I am much brighter than most other stars.
🌌 I can be seen from very far away.
